hero.headline: Your Full-Stack Developer,
hero.description: Not another unreliable freelancer. I work alongside your existing team, fixing your biggest pain first‚Äîwhether that's WordPress chaos, eCommerce issues, or API black holes. Start small, prove value, expand when ready.
highlights: Your project stays on track. Your deadlines get met.
I deliver it all. Or refine it. Your choice.

valueBlocks.title: Comprehensive Technical Solutions
valueBlocks.subtitle: Specialising in complex WordPress builds, high-converting eCommerce stores, and sophisticated API integrations.

features.title: Custom Web & eCommerce
features.description: WordPress, Shopify, Magento, and Laravel development tailored to your brand.

features.title: Automation & APIs
features.description: Seamlessly connect tools with Zapier, custom scripts, and marketing API integrations (Google Ads/Facebook).

standard.title: Clean Code.
standard.description: I don't just write code; I build systems that are easy to understand and update as your business grows. Whether it's PSD-to-WordPress or custom plugin development, my focus is always on quality and meeting your deadlines.

techStack.title: Technology Stack
techStack.description: A comprehensive toolkit for building scalable, maintainable web solutions.

testimonials.title: Feedback from Our Esteemed Clients on Our Services and Solutions
testimonials.description: We highlight the experiences and testimonials of our valued clients, showcasing their insights on our services. Their feedback provides a deeper understanding of how our solutions have met their needs, addressed challenges, and contributed to their success.
